name: Essence Of Time
description:
Essence of Time is a hand-drawn RPG visual novel filled with turn-based combat and storylines that'll rip your heart out before lifting your spirits.

The new emperor of O'Qua will be chosen from the students studying essence calling at the Academy of Essential Arts in the legendary Crown Challenge. But you...you're not even a student...yet! Gear up for the first part in this 90s adventure cartoon inspired saga.

If you enjoy, consider supporting our Kickstarter. We're two brothers passionate about this project, but we can't continue the story without you!

Link to our Kickstarter

Join our Discord

Feel free to report bugs or issues to support@boxfiregames.com
